mapper.select: SELECT * from swcmes_store where attrib not like 'XXX%' and attrib not like '000%'

SELECT ss.suppType, ss.suppTitle, ss.suppModel, sg.goodsType ,sg.goodsTitle,sg.goodsModel, a.* from swcmes_store a left join swcmes_supp ss on a.suppNo = ss.suppNo left join swcmes_goods sg on sg.goodsNo = a.goodsNo where a.attrib not like 'XXX%' and a.attrib like '000%'

SELECT ss.suppTitle,ss.suppType,ss.suppUnit,ss.suppModel,sg.goodsTitle,sg.goodsType,sg.goodsUnit,sg.goodsModel,sc.codeDesc, a.* from swcmes_store a left join swcmes_goods sg on sg.goodsNo = a.goodsNo left join swcmes_supp ss on ss.suppNo = a.suppNo left join swcmes_code sc on sc.codeNo = a.locateCode where storeioNo= #{storeioNo}

SELECT storeioNo, sg.goodsTitle,sg.goodsType,sg.goodsUnit,sg.goodsModel,a.inoutTyp, sum(a.storeQty) storeQty from swcmes_store a left join swcmes_goods sg on sg.goodsNo = a.goodsNo left join swcmes_code sc on sc.codeNo = a.locateCode where a.attrib not like 'XXX%' and suppNo is null group by inoutTyp, sg.goodsTitle, a.goodsNo order by sg.goodsTitle, sg.goodsModel, storeioNo desc, inoutTyp

SELECT a.storeioNo, sg.suppTitle, sg.suppType, sg.suppUnit, sg.suppModel, a.inoutTyp, sum(a.storeQty) storeQty from swcmes_store a left join swcmes_supp sg on sg.suppNo = a.suppNo left join swcmes_code sc on sc.codeNo = a.locateCode where a.attrib not like 'XXX%' and a.goodsNo is null group by inoutTyp, sg.suppTitle, a.suppNo order by sg.suppTitle, sg.suppModel, storeioNo desc, inoutTyp
mapper.update: update swcmes_store set attrib = 'XXXXX' ,modDate = now() where storeioNo = #{storeioNo}
